des:
"This heavenly fruit salad tossed with homemade whipped cream came about when bananas, mangoes, and blueberries were on sale for Mother's Day, and I was already whipping cream for another dish. The entire bowl was demolished by 6 people! 

This combination would also work well with a variety of fruits added or substituted in, but I particularly like the unique flavor the mangoes add."
ins: Beat cream and vanilla extract in a bowl using an electric mixer until fluffy and stiff peaks form. Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the whipped cream will form sharp peaks. Fold mangoes, bananas, and blueberries into whipped cream.
